hi there, 

This picture is about the joint Court hosted by both Chinese and Colonial officers. In Chinese it is called“会审公廨", the place where the Chinese officers and Colonial Officers judged the Chinese Criminals.

comment.author: 66757584@N06
comment._content: The female prisoners have been locked in a cangue.  This was used a form of punishment that made it very uncomfortable to do anything.  Often a cangue would only be placed on one prisoner and s/he would be forced to sleep in the cangue as well. This cangue has been designed for three.
